fr.istic.m1.aco.miniediteur.v1.ihm

Class IHMGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.istic.m1.aco.miniediteur.v1.ihm.BaseIHM
      • fr.istic.m1.aco.miniediteur.v1.ihm.IHMGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Invoker, Observer

    public class IHMGui
extends BaseIHM
    This class implements an Graphic UserInterfaced application that simply offers editor functions.
    Author:
    Jiyoung Park

      • refreshButtons

        private void refreshButtons()
        This method will be called after all the button pressed event. When the content is empty, the insert button will be enabled. When the content is not empty, the insert button will be disabled.
